value:
I hope someone is maintaining the
greenhouse. But I doubt anyone will
bother with the Duscur flowers.

My purpose is to be a shield for
His Highness.

Do not concern yourself with me.
The people of Duscur have been
despised for years.

Associating yourself with me will not
lead to any enjoyment.

My duty is to remain at the side of
His Highness. I will never falter.

I am here to bring you regards from
$Nf. That is all.

I will use this power to aid
His Highness.

Fighting for you has strengthened my
ability to defend His Highness.
War is an effective teacher.

This changes nothing. I will continue
to do what must be done.

This life was given to me by
His Highness. Serving him is
everything to me.

I am from Duscur. The people there
are accused of regicide against the
Holy Kingdom of Faerghus.$k$pFor that reason, Duscur is despised.
In Faerghus, we are harassed.
People spit. Throw stones.$k$pHere, it is different. It is strange not
to feel the hatred of others wherever
I go.$k$pYou in particular accept others
without question. It intrigues me.$k$pIf it is all right with you... I would
be honored to call you my friend.
ふっ
ぬうっ！
ぐうっ
があああっ
I will break you.
For His Highness.
No.
This is my sworn duty.
Your Highness, you must—
sigh
Dedue. Vassal to His Highness, Prince Dimitri.
It would be best if you kept your distance from me.
The people of Duscur are despised in Fódlan.
Animals have never taken to me. They do not like my face.
I will brook no insult to His Highness.
Nothing remains of Duscur.
I have cooked you a meal. Please eat as much as you'd like.
I am prepared.
Proceed with caution.
I serve His Highness.
